physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a building that contains several domes
 minarets
 and pointed arches from the parapet. There are numerous windows that are circular and rectangular in shape. The entrances to the building are wide and dome-shaped. The foreground of the photograph shows a road. A lady and a man can be seen walking
 at the right hand side of the photograph. There are people who are entering the building
 on the left hand side of the photograph.

metadata.title_text: Kuala Lumpur railway station Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a building that contains several domes, minarets, and pointed arches from the parapet. There are numerous windows that are circular and rectangular in shape. The entrances to the building are wide and dome-shaped. The foreground of the photograph shows a road. A lady and a man can be seen walking, at the right hand side of the photograph. There are people who are entering the building, on the left hand side of the photograph.
